Title: Delete any type of files
Description:
This is a small utility which can be used to delete any type of file from any directory (and it's sub-directories) based on their modified date.

You can control all settings via app.config and DeleteFile.config files.

Project Description
This is a small utility which can be used to delete any type of file from any directory (and it's sub-directories) based on their modified date.
